name: Consent and PIN for booking service request
scenarioId: ios/A_combined_business_scenario_on_Travel_4/Travel_Book_reservation_by_presenting_attestations_remotely-Booking_Service-remote_cross_device_66/bookReservationCrossDevice:Consent and PIN for booking service request
methodName: Consent and PIN for booking service request

testSteps.description: Given the user is presented with the request from the Booking service
When the user consents to the release of the multiple requested attestations
Then a screen with the PIN is displayed
And the user enters the PIN

userStory.storyName: Booking Service Reservation with EUDI Wallet (cross device)
userStory.displayName: Booking Service Reservation with EUDI Wallet (cross device)
userStory.narrative:
As a EUDI Wallet User
  I want to book my reservation by present attestations from my EUDI Wallet to the requesting Relying Party (i.e. ‘Booking Service’)
  So that I can be authenticated by the Relying Party and book my reservation as part of my travel arrangements

title: Consent and PIN for booking service request
